author: jdillon
msg: o Updated how the reactor includes are generated.  Now possible to specify
a list of comma seperated module names via -Dmodules=moduleA,moduleB
to onlu include moduleA and moduleB in the reactor
o Updated README to this effect
o Read comments in maven.xml:modules:reactor:init for full details

author: jdillon
msg: o use reactorProjects to determine which modules' site docs to copy

author: jdillon
msg: o Add placeholder class to keep site generation from failing
